comments: He published in Orchid Rev. &  J. Roy. Hort. Soc. as E. Cooper.
examples: Bulbophyllum spathulatum Rolfe ex E.W. Cooper in Orch. Rev. 37: 106 (1929)
source: IK db.  Obit. in Orchid Rev., 58: 84 (1950) and Gard. Chron., 127: 192 (13 May 1950). See also Gard. Chron., Ser. 3, 88: 166 (1930).
